thread.title: Clippers beat Nuggets 103-96 in preseason opener
thread.title_full: Clippers beat Nuggets 103-96 in preseason opener

author: CURTIS ZUPKE, Associated Press
title: Clippers beat Nuggets 103-96 in preseason opener
text:
Clippers beat Nuggets 103-96 in preseason opener CURTIS ZUPK , Associated Press By CURTIS ZUPKE, Associated Press Updated 12:16 am, Saturday, October 3, 2015 Photo: Jae C. Hong, AP Image 1 of / 10 Close Image 1 of 10 
Los Angeles Clippers' DeAndre Jordan, left, and Denver Nuggets' Jameer Nelson fight for a loose ball during the first half of an NBA preseason basketball game, Friday, Oct. 2, 2015, in Los Angeles. Photo: Jae C. Hong, AP Los Angeles Clippers' DeAndre Jordan, left, and Denver Nuggets'... Image 2 of 10 
Los Angeles Clippers' Paul Pierce, front, is defended by Denver Nuggets' Kenneth Faried during the first half of an NBA preseason basketball game, Friday, Oct. 2, 2015, in Los Angeles. Photo: Jae C. Hong, AP Los Angeles Clippers' Paul Pierce, front, is defended by Denver... Image 3 of 10 
Denver Nuggets' Emmanuel Mudiay, center, goes up for a basket as he is defended by Los Angeles Clippers' Blake Griffin during the second half of an NBA preseason basketball game, Friday, Oct. 2, 2015, in Los Angeles. The Clippers won 103-96. Photo: Jae C. Hong, AP Denver Nuggets' Emmanuel Mudiay, center, goes up for a basket as he... Image 4 of 10 
Los Angeles Clippers' DeAndre Jordan gestures to a teammate during the first half of an NBA preseason basketball game against the Denver Nuggets, Friday, Oct. 2, 2015, in Los Angeles. Photo: Jae C. Hong, AP Los Angeles Clippers' DeAndre Jordan gestures to a teammate during... Image 5 of 10 
Los Angeles Clippers' DeAndre Jordan descends after making a dunk during the first half of an NBA preseason basketball game against the Denver Nuggets, Friday, Oct. 2, 2015, in Los Angeles. Photo: Jae C. Hong, AP Los Angeles Clippers' DeAndre Jordan descends after making a dunk... Image 6 of 10 
Los Angeles Clippers' Blake Griffin looks to pass during the first half of an NBA preseason basketball game against the Denver Nuggets, Friday, Oct. 2, 2015, in Los Angeles. Photo: Jae C. Hong, AP Los Angeles Clippers' Blake Griffin looks to pass during the first... Image 7 of 10 
Los Angeles Clippers' DeAndre Jordan makes a dunk during the first half of an NBA preseason basketball game against the Denver Nuggets, Friday, Oct. 2, 2015, in Los Angeles. Photo: Jae C. Hong, AP Los Angeles Clippers' DeAndre Jordan makes a dunk during the first... Image 8 of 10 
Los Angeles Clippers' Austin Rivers, center, is defended by Denver Nuggets' Kenneth Faried, left, and J.J. Hickson during the first half of an NBA preseason basketball game, Friday, Oct. 2, 2015, in Los Angeles. Photo: Jae C. Hong, AP Los Angeles Clippers' Austin Rivers, center, is defended by Denver... Image 9 of 10 
Los Angeles Clippers' Blake Griffin, right, shoots under pressure by Denver Nuggets' Wilson Chandler during the first half of an NBA preseason basketball game, Friday, Oct. 2, 2015, in Los Angeles. Photo: Jae C. Hong, AP Los Angeles Clippers' Blake Griffin, right, shoots under pressure... Image 10 of 10 Clippers beat Nuggets 103-96 in preseason opener 1 / 10 Back to Gallery LOS ANGELES (AP) â€” DeAndre Jordan had 15 points and 12 rebounds to help the Los Angeles Clippers beat the Denver Nuggets 103-96 on Friday night in the first game of the NBA preseason. Jordan scored 12 points in the first half on 5-for-6 shooting, including three dunks. The Clippers spoiled Nuggets coach Michael Malone 's debut. Nuggets: Joffrey Lauvergne scored 16 points on 7-for-10 shooting and had 11 rebounds in a reserve role. Rookie Emmanuel Mudiay missed eight of his first 11 shots and finished with 14 points. Clippers: Josh Smith had 13 points and eight rebounds, Chris Paul added 12 points, nine assists and five rebounds in 23 minutes, and newcomer Paul Pierce started and scored five points in 15 minutes. Star watch: Paul made a 3-pointer as he was fouled in the third quarter. He missed the free throw, but Pierce followed with a 3-pointer. Midseason form: Jordan had an airball on a third-quarter free throw. A 42-percent shooter from the line in his career, he finished 3 of 5. Up next: The Clippers will play Toronto in Vancouver, British Columbia, on Sunday. Denver is at Dallas on Tuesday night. Southeast Texas sports news
